about_the_game:
Introducing Bit-cremental: Fishistry Color!

Take your Game Boy nostalgia to the next level with this vibrant DLC!

This is my way of saying thank you for supporting the development of this game—and future projects to come. The Fishistry Color DLC doesn’t affect gameplay balance or progression, but it adds a splash of color and charm to your fish-raising experience.

Your support means the world, and this DLC is a small way to give back while helping us continue to create and expand this world.

Thank you for all of your support—happy fishing!

*You can utilize the DLC in the "Palette" menu in-game by toggling "Full Color".

name: Bit-cremental: Fishistry Color

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
